roleset.name: tranform a molecule into another with the same atoms, but a different arrangement

example.name: example with intentional agent and result
example.text: We isomerized these cis-sulfoxides to trans-sulfoxides to evaluate elimination from the trans-precipiton.

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: After catalyst removal, the copolymer resin is isomerized with iodine as a catalyst at a temperature between 200° to 260° C.
